page.title: 12COMPUTERS:THORNTON SCHOOL
page.content: AT SCHOOL WE HAVE A COMPUTER RML480Z, DUAL DISK DRIVE,EPSON PRINTER AND V.D.U. WE NORMALLY USE IT FOR PLAYING EDUCATIONAL GAMES WHICH WE LOAD ON THE DISK DRIVE.WE ALSO WRITE STORIES ON THE COMPUTER AND PRINT THEM OUT ON THE PRINTER.COMPUTERS ARE VERY COMMON IN THE HOME BUT THESE MACHINES ARE NORMALLY USED FOR GAMES ONLY. COMPUTERS ARE ALSO USED IN INDUSTRY AND BUSINESS.HERE ARE SOME EXAMPLES:IDENTIFYING CARS FOR POLICE PURPOSES,FLYING PLANES,ORDERING STOCKS FOR BIG SUPER STORES,MAKING SPECIAL EFFECTS IN FILMS . COMPUTERS ALSO MAKE AND TEST CARS.WITHOUT COMPUTERS MEN COULD NOT TRAVEL IN SPACE.THE U.S. SPACE SHUTTLE COLUMBIA HAS 5 MAIN COMPUTERS WITHOUT WHICH IT COULD NOT TAKE OFF. BY{DAMIAN JOHNSON.}
